name: Maul's Lightsaber
Lore: 'Trained in the Sith arts, Maul''s ferocity in combat is matched by no other. When armed with a lightsaber, his opponent''s only option is usually that of escape.',
Text: 'Deploy on Maul. While on Maul, may not be stolen. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.',
